An excellent fantasy 3D action game. At one time, the game won a huge army of fans thanks to its excellent combat system, excellent design and the intelligence of monsters that has never been surpassed by anyone. A grim new threat looms over The Central Kingdoms . The borders protected by the fierce King’s Knights are no longer secure. The fearsome orc clans, more numerous than ever, lurk on all roads. Not even the stout dwarves, hidden in their underground palaces, seem safe from threat – from the unknown tunnels of its mines, a foul army of hideous creatures advances inexorably.
